alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 6:33AM PDT until March 14 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior County. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from noon to 6 P Monday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
